grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 訴状【ソジョウ】petition, complaint, (legal) brief
提訴【テイソ】presenting a case, suing
kun reading compounds: 訴える【うったえる】to raise, to bring to (someone's attention), to appeal to (reason, emotions, etc.), to work on (one's emotions), to play on (one's sympathies), to complain, to sue (a person), to take someone to court, to resort to (e.g. arms, violence)
